adrFormatAddress: 475 Riverside Dr #1350, New York, NY 10115, USA

originalText.text:
I started out working for WOS as an IT Business Analyst consultant. When I received an opportunity internally for an IT Security Analyst role, WOS made sure my transition was smooth. With their assistance, I was able to pay for the last year of my Bachelor’s degree. After just a year and a half with WOS, I now work as a full-time employee.

I am incredibly appreciative of all the support I’ve received, especially from Valerie, my Client Service Manager. She was so helpful with any professional and personal concerns I had. Overall, I’ve learned a lot of lessons along the way and I am grateful for the career experience provided to me by WOS.

originalText.text: I began working for WOS in October 2019. One year later my life is in a whole new direction and I would like to thank WOS for taking part in making that happen. Being newer to software development it was very difficult to find promising career opportunities. WOS not only helped with placement, their helping hand reached so much further then just job placement. The support and relief offered by WOS is like no company I have ever worked for. Valerie was my recruiter and she is one of the nicest people I have ever met. I have and will continue to recommend people to this program. Thank you so much for everything your company has done for me and my family.

originalText.text: As a current manager at WOS, my story is a bit different. After many years as an educator, musician, business owner. I found myself seeking to find an opportunity to bring my years of experience/practice in a manner that could benefit others. That was what attracted me to WOS. Little did I realize that I would be the beneficiary of this wonderful organization. The mission of training/support with the goal of developing diverse talent for the workplace is more than a statement. It is the lifeblood. Helping and seeing people find their career path motivates me everyday. I am grateful for their support.

originalText.text: WOS truly cares about their people. My time spent as a consultant in this program I will never forget. Great experience and amazing support from their CSMs (WOS supervisors who are really friendly, great people who want you to succeed),. They were even able to help out with tuition assistance which allowed me to finish my degree while on the job. Overall, they provide great experience and opportunities, A+ organization.

originalText.text: Workforce Opportunity Services provided me the opportunity to be successful, not just once but twice. I can't say enough about how grateful I am to their client service managers and the organization. They listened and helped me overcome the struggles I was facing and found a way to ensure I was in an environment that I could learn and grow.
